references.reason: This paper provides technical details about GPT-4, a large language model used in this work for generating instance captions, which is crucial to the method's capability.

references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper introduces DALL-E 3, a state-of-the-art text-to-image generation model, which is used as a benchmark for comparison and to highlight the limitations of existing methods in regional instance control.
This paper introduces ROI-Align, a crucial operation in object detection that inspires the complementary ROI-Unpool operation used in this work for efficient and accurate ROI manipulation.
This paper introduces GLIGEN, a method for instance control using implicit ROI injection, which serves as a baseline for comparison and helps to highlight the limitations of prior methods.

references.paper_title: Migc: Multi-instance generation controller for text-to-image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces MIGC, another prior method for instance control using explicit ROI injection with attention masks, which is compared with the proposed method to demonstrate its advantages.
